overview_of_class: Students majoring in video/broadcast employ advanced techniques using professional equipment to report, shoot and edit packages in Chicago on deadline two days per week, then produce a show for air in Evanston on Friday. Students learn how to enterprise and complete a story in a day, then learn how to produce a longer feature package.
name: Advanced Video Journalism
title: JOUR JOUR 433-1-20 Advanced Video Journalism
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-requisite: Students must have completed JOUR 433-0 to register this course.
